validation.errors.messages.wrong_length: {property} is the wrong length (should be {count} characters)
validation.errors.messages.greater_than_: {property} must be greater than or equal to {count}
validation.errors.messages.less_than_or_: {property} must be less than or equal to {count}
validation.errors.messages.file_size_out: {property} size {value} is not between required range
validation.errors.messages.file_limit_ou: {property} total number is out of range
validation.errors.messages.date_in_past: {property} must be before the date today
validation.errors.messages.date_in_futur: {property} must be after the date today
validation.errors.messages.datetime_in_p: {property} must be before the date and time today
validation.errors.messages.datetime_in_f: {property} must be after the date and time today
validation.errors.messages.datetime_type: {property} must be a valid date and time
